statements: UPDATE SurveyResponses SET age = 25 WHERE participant_id = 1;

UPDATE participants SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE researchers_survey_responses SET response = 'Agree' WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
UPDATE participants SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Female' WHERE id = 123;
